data.title: Paul Glen Poor Obituary 2022
data.meta_description: Paul Poor passed away in the early morning of November 5, 2022, at the age of 74. He will be greatly missed by friends and family alike.              Paul was an excellent elect...
data.text:
Paul Poor passed away in the early morning of November 5, 2022, at the age of 74. He will be greatly missed by friends and family alike.

Paul was an excellent electrician and had a solid career for over 56 years. He and his brother Virgle eventually bought the company they worked for. He could also be found renovating or just generally working with his hands. Paul is preceded in death by his parents: Otto and Irene Poor; brother: George Marshall Poor; sister: Jan Elizabeth Brooks.

Paul is survived by his brother: Virgle and spouse Janis Poor of Kemp, TX; sister: Dorothy and spouse Bobby Wofford of Red Oak, TX; sister-in-law: Sherry Poor of Bagwell, TX; nieceâ€™s: Debra Davis of Florida, Denise Henderson of Kemp, TX, Angel and spouse Mitch Brown of Red Oak, TX, Tamara and spouse of Bagwell, TX; nephews: Dusty Poor of Kemp, TX, Robert and spouse Melissa of Red Oak, TX, Carl and Rana Brooks of Mesquite, TX, Jim Brooks of Red Oak, TX, and Michael Poor of Bagwell, TX.
